Companion: Hey @, I've got free time today! $q 575/576 emilyCompanion_followup#Want to go find something fun to do?#$r 575 10 emilyCompanion_yes#Absolutely! I have some cool things to show you too!#$r 576 0 I'm sorry, but today's actually bad for me.
emilyCompanion_yes: I knew I could count on you for a good time! Lead the way.$h
emilyCompanion_no: No worries. I'm off on Sundays so let me know if you're free next week!
emilyCompanion_followup: #p 575 #So thanks for coming with me! There's so many beautiful things to see around here.|I'm working nearly every night so I know it's hard to find time to take a break.
CompanionActions: Hey @, what's up? #$q 500/501 CompanionFollowup#What's up?#$r 500 0 CompanionActionEnd#That's all the time I have to hang out today.#$r 501 0 CompanionActionContinue#Nothing, just taking a breather.
CompanionActionEnd: Alright, well thanks for hanging out with me today!$h
